ObjectClass.Name: Resource Processor
ObjectClass.Description:
RESOURCE PROCESSOR (RP):
Assimilates resources: Power and Q-Plasma Can convert QP into Power Can move itself

Objective.Name: Process Resource
Objective.Details: \Process Q-Plasma\ \For best efficiency limit to 1 RP\ per QP Cell

Objective.Name: Relocate
Objective.Details: \Move to a new location \after current processing cycle ends

Objective.Name: QPlasma -> Power
Objective.Details: \Convert 100 QP to 200 Power\after current processing cycle ends

Objective.Name: Teleport
Objective.Details: \Teleport to a specified location\after current processing cycle ends\ \ Must be near a Teleporter

ObjectClass.Name: R. P. (Closed)
ObjectClass.Description:
RESOURCE PROCESSOR (RP):
Assimilates resources: Power and Q-Plasma Can convert QP into Power Can move itself

Objective.Name: Process Resource
Objective.Details: \Process Q-Plasma\ \For best efficiency limit to 1 RP\ per QP Cell

Objective.Name: QPlasma -> Power
Objective.Details: \Convert 100 QP to 400 Power\after current processing cycle ends

Objective.Name: Teleport
Objective.Details: \Teleport to a specified location\ \ Must be near a Teleporter

Objective.Name: Bootstrap Q-Plasma
Objective.Details: Extract 100 units of QP and Power from \the future by Chronoportation\ \WARNING: acquire Chrono-tech and \125 QP by departure point
